Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to the original fairy tale by the brothers Grimm and the originality of the writers. The fact that it was pretty much a success with the general public outraged me a lot, and the fact that I enjoy the original Grimm tale found the movie all the more disgusting.
Hateful Eight:

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the countless empires that make up the Galaxy beyond.
